body.name: Portable Washing Machine, Foldable Mini Washing Machine, Small Washing Machine for Underwear, Baby Clothes, or Small Items, Suitable for Apartments, Dormitories, Camping, Travel (6 Liters),Green

features: Compact and Portable: Mini portable folding washing machine, with a size of 10.24 x 10.24 x 7.48 inches when unfolded and 10.24 x 10.24 x 4.72 inches when folded, and with a dehydration function, equipped with a dehydration basket and drain pipe.

Suitable for: Upgrade to a larger capacity that can accommodate 6 liters. Ideal for cleaning lightweight clothing that requires separate cleaning, such as baby clothing, underwear, towels, socks, or other small items. Using both positive and negative kneading, coupled with high-frequency washing, effectively removes stains.
Folding Design: Press down folding, lightweight, easy to move, easy to store in a small space. Ideal for camping, vacation, business travel, apartments, dormitories, and won't take up too much space.

Safe and Efficient: Using TPE+PP material, it is more resistant to aging, yellowing, and high temperature. Rated voltage: 12V, rated power:36W. High quality motor, powerful power, precise control of washing rhythm, deep cleaning.

Easy to operate: One click operation, click the start button to start working, and click the start button to switch functions. Equipped with 5 minute and 10 minute timed washing buttons, as well as a 3 minute dehydration button. Simple and convenient, with multiple functions to serve you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This little machine is amazing !
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I clean houses privately, and some very questionable I did not want to bring the cloths after used into my home and put in my machine , I purchased this and was very skeptical! These cloths were filthy to the point I didn’t know the white one was white ! I washed two times and they came out spotless !! Great purchase

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works For Small Items
reviews.reviewText: I use this machine to wash my compression socks because they’re so delicate. The quality lacks a little. I could rate it only 3 stars. It’s very fidgety. You can’t overfill the basin, or water will slosh everywhere. It is quite wobbly, especially during the “dehydration” cycle. The lid kept trying to wiggle off. I had a hard time draining all the water out of the basin. I ended up disconnecting the hose, and just allowing it to drain from the plug. Then I took a small towel and hand dried the entire unit. I’m pretty sure it is holding water somewhere, so open air drying is a must. It’s small enough to fit anywhere, and does a nice job agitating “very” small clothing. I do not recommend this if you’re trying to do soiled laundry. Delicates or (maybe) baby items only!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Don't waste your time
reviews.reviewText: 1st its unsanitary dirty water stays under where motor and draining cap is it doesn't drain all completely.I bought this to wash my small dog belly bands. well I tried washing 5 at a time they were left soaken wet, tried washing 4 and same result, then tried with 3. then 2 and even with 1 and same results. The washing part was just a waist I wash better by hand and ring out better. save your time & money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's nice that it's small and can folded up. So I've used it think I put too much water in it was splashing everywhere, deadly doesn't snap on it's too big. Sounds like it's struggling it's going to die on the first wash.. it's good but get what you pay for

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a champ!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I needed this to wash my dog clothes because he sheds a lot so I didn't like washing his stuff in my washer so this works perfect. Now he has his own 🤗 and I no longer have to worry about the dog hair being in my washer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars powerful for its size and cleans good. it does not come with power cord!!
reviews.reviewText: the collapsible bucket with handle is really convenient. it has 3, 5, or 10 minutes options. it has a pretty powerful spin and clothes come out clean after rinse. it also comes with a collapsible basket for dry spin. the only thing that bother me is the drain plug is hard to plug back in sometimes. also just a heads up-it did not come with a power cord. luckily I found an old laptop ac adaptor charger that fit. other than that, overall it works better than expected!! I love this little washer

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Broke within six months
reviews.reviewText: It was working great and doing what was needed for under garments and within six months, bought in October it's no longer spinning or working. There.isnno information about the warranty and asurion is giving me a hard time about the replacement.
